Protein names: Bifunctional polymyxin resistance protein ArnA [Includes: UDP-4-amino-4-deoxy-L-arabinose formyltransferase (EC 2.1.2.13) (ArnAFT) (UDP-L-Ara4N formyltransferase); UDP-glucuronic acid oxidase, UDP-4-keto-hexauronic acid decarboxylating (EC 1.1.1.305) (ArnADH) (UDP-GlcUA decarboxylase) (UDP-glucuronic acid dehydrogenase)]
